text: Fan xiangying tamen de zhu [de zhaohuan] zhe [xin'an la ji mu sheng deng], tamen jiang huode zuimei de baochou [leyuan]; fan wei xiangying ta [de zhaohuan] zhe, jishi tamen yongyou dadishang de yiqie [zhu 1], bingqie zai jia shang tongyang de yi fen, name, tamen biyong ta lai shuzui [zhe zhishi tulao]. Zhexie ren bi shou yanli de qingsuan, tamen de guisu shi huo yu [zhu 2]. Guisu zhen elie!
